title: [LFT] Looking for Active team in OCE
body:
Im looking for a team in OCE that plays ranked teams everyday :) or atleast like a few times a week. I play Mid, I can get swapped to top but then I'll need to practice real hard and start changing up my champion pool + runes.

username - ADG Counter
add me there and we'll see if you can get more info about me

replies.body: Right now I'm on tilt, Idk why but I just am

Hey if your sill on I just submitted a discussion just like this looking for a team to make lets do it!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
but first add me cos I gotta sleep now so add me :GalaKnight
and we'll see tomoz
